results.prompt:

Yes, there are a couple of ways that you can do this.  One of the easiest ways to do this is by using a networked computer and a program that allows you to transfer files from one place to another.  There are a few different ways to do this.  The easiest method is to use a program called "scp" or "secure copy".  This program allows you to send a file or files to another computer on the network.  You can use this program to transfer files to anyone on the network.  Here's an example:

sudo scp user@server:/home/user/filename.txt user@server:filename.txt

The above command will copy the contents of /home/user/filename.txt from your computer to a file named "filename.txt" on the computer at "server".

Here's a similar command that will copy the contents of /home/user/filename.txt from your computer to your computer:

scp user@server:/home/user/filename.txt user@server:

The above command will copy the contents of /home/user/filename.txt from your computer to the computer named "server".

Another way to do this

results.raw_gpt4_response:
